feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:26 a.m. ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -2.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 6:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
